name: Cherry Bomb Blast
description:
Welcome to Cherry Bomb Blast!

Originally released in 2014, this simple game about global warfare against fruit was returned! Join the mysterious Dr. Tordoc in a battle to rid the Earth of fruits, forever! But is Tordoc secretly planning something...?

 Experience four maps and a boss battle from the original game, along with new ranks, achievements, music, and more! Click or tap your way through the war on fruits, will you lead Earth to victory? Or is this all part of an elaborate trap?

We hope you enjoy the re-release of an old classic, and would love to hear any support/feedback you might have!

Have fun!
